pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, September 19, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, September 19, 2016:

New York, New York, United States

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister meets with Her Majesty Queen Rania Al Abdullah.

United Nations Headquarters.

Notes for media:

  • Closed to media


10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will co-chair with Her Majesty Queen Rania Al Abdullah a roundtable on “International Action and Cooperation on Refugees and Migrants: The Way Ahead”.

Conference Room #4, First Basement
United Nations Headquarters
New York City, New York

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver a keynote address at the Global Compact Luncheon.

Delegates Dining Room, 4th Floor
United Nations Headquarters
New York City, New York    

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage


Media appearance

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a live interview with BuzzFeed News, which will be streamed on Facebook.com/BuzzFeedNews.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
